close.description: General close action, such as closing modal

search__form_label.description: Search input context label which describes what is being searched

import__form__file_select.description: Import file selector click action text

import__form__submit.description: Import click action and submit form text

import__form__popup_warning.message: Using "Select file" may cause the popup to close. Try opening the extension in a new tab first.
import__form__popup_warning.description: Warns user about select file action when extension is open as popup

import__form__prompt_unsaved.description: Ask user if changes should be discarded

import__form__error_no_session_found.description: Error when form is submitted but no session is found

import__form__error_no_file_found.description: Error when no file is found

error.description: Generic error template. Expects error parameter to be passed in.
